name: FxAnalysisAPI_v2
desc: A protocol that host applications implement to provide information to plug-ins that support the FxAnalyzer protocol.

items.name: func startForwardAnalysis(FxAnalysisLocation, ofParameter: UInt32)
items.desc: Requests that the application begin a forward analysis of an image parameter from start to end.

items.name: func startBackwardAnalysis(FxAnalysisLocation, ofParameter: UInt32)
items.desc: Requests that the application begin a backward analysis of an image parameter from start to end.
